data.message: Hi, I created a FB account for my mom Wang Shi Lo. She's almost 90 years old. I started to teach her using FB. At the same time, I will use the account to record her daily life in the near future. However, the account has been blocked. I've submitted proof of ID to your team. Please help us recover the account soon. Thanks a lot.

replies.message: Hi Lo. If you have reported this issue to our team, hang tight while we take the time to review the situation. Thanks for your patience! -Anna
